Class TestUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • TestUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, ItemListener, EventListener

    public class TestUI
extends Object
implements ActionListener, ItemListener
    Tests the User Interface by creating objects of type GraphView, LegendPanel, and countryMenuItem.
    Author:
    Team04

        public void buildCountryList(Country[] countries)
        Creates a LinkedList of Countries
        Parameters:
        countries - Array of country Objects

      • createUI

        public void createUI()
        Creates a UI panel that displays a scrollable list of Checkboxes with countryNames and a graph button that redirects the user to the GraphView Panel

      • itemStateChanged

        public void itemStateChanged(ItemEvent evt)
        Invoked when an item is selected by the user. Gets the selected item and adds it to a new LinkedList of country objects
        Specified by:
        itemStateChanged in interface ItemListener

      • initializeGraphView

        public void initializeGraphView()
        Creates the GraphView and LegendPanel by creating a frame and adding the panels to it. GraphView constructor takes a LinkedList of selected countries as a parameter.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent evt)
        Invoked when an action occurs. Listens to the JButton, and when pressed, displays the GraphView and Legend Panel.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
